mismatches.label: Gross Exposure
mismatches.llm_reasoning: While 'Gross Exposure' is a quantitative metric, it appears to be a financial/risk metric rather than an ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) disclosure metric. The entity type definition specifically requires ESG-related disclosures, which this does not semantically represent.
